relation: Beat all 32 levels in Challenge Mode with Red Coins, Egg, and High Score
Collect all 5 Red Coins in all 32 levels in Challenge Mode
Beat the High Score in all 32 levels in Challenge Mode
Fill up the Challenge Mode Score Meter
Collect the Yoshi Egg from all 32 levels in Challenge Mode
Beat 8-4 in the Lost Levels (Super Mario Brothers for Super Players)

textBeforeTable: Simply do these things and you will earn more pictures in your album: More Album Unlockables Unlockables Contributed By: SuperMarioFan. After the Gameboy logo has appeared, hold either the A or B buttons. The music that plays when you save the Princess will play on the intro screen. textAfterTable: Contributed By: peach freak. More album unlockables. More album unlockables. Unlockable How to Unlock Find a 1-Up Mushroom anywhere in the game. 1-Up Mushroom To get this picture, defeat a Blooper (Octopus). Blooper picture Stomp or run into (With a Starman) a Bullet Bill. Bullet Bill To get this picture, kill a Cheep Cheep (Fish). Cheep Cheep picture Complete a stage with 1, 3, or 6 as the final number of the remaining time. Fireworks To get this picture, stomp a Goomba. Goomba picture To get this picture, defeat one set of the Hammer Bros. Hammer Bros. picture To get this picture, kill a Lakitu (Cloud man on 4-1). Lakitu picture Beat the original 1985 game. Princess Peach Link up with a friend and trade high scores. Trading Enter a bonus stage anywhere in the game. Vine Link up with a friend and play Vs. Mode. Vs. Mode Contributed By: pokemon man and CaptainDrakesGhost. Photo Album Pictures To unlock the Photo Album pictures, you must: Unlockable How to Unlock Defeat Bowser
